Race.SpecificTitle: PW School District No. 1-A -- 2.21 Mills Renewal - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide School District No. 1-A Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall School District No. 1-A of LaSalle Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of two and twenty-one hundredths (2.21) mills on all of the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $172,380 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with year 2026, for the purpose of maintaining and operating schools and making improvements to the public schools of LaSalle Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: Whitehall Fire District Prop. No. 1 -- 10.05 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Whitehall Fire District Propositions 
Proposition No. 1
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Whitehall Fire District of the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a ten and five hundredths (10.05) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $35,700 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of maintaining and paying the operating expense of the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Whitehall Fire District Prop. No. 2 -- 10.05 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Whitehall Fire District Propositions
Proposition No. 2
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Whitehall Fire District of the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana (the "District''), levy a ten and five hundredths (10.05) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $35,700 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for maintenance and upgrading the District with necessary sub-stations, equipment, and insurance?
